title: Winne & Multicultural West‑Kruiskade
info: Diptych by Amsterdam artist Judith de Leeuw (JDL): a hyper‑realistic portrait of Rotterdam rapper Winne and a playful tribute to the diversity of the West‑Kruiskade. JDL works exclusively in black and white to focus attention on emotion and essence.

title: Astro Abstract Portal
info: French artist Astro uses shadows, light and depth to create an optical‑illusion tunnel, evolving classic wild‑style graffiti into abstract geometry.

title: Onesto – City & People
info: Brazilian artist Alex Hornest (Onesto) explores how a city interacts with its inhabitants, inviting passer‑by engagement in this São Paulo‑inspired mural.

title: Giraffe Embrace
info: Outsider Artist Maarten Wendrich depicts a man hugging a giraffe; painted by Marijn Gronert & Wessel Heij for Maison Savant on the former zoo street.

title: Salvador Allende Tribute
info: 1990s homage to Chilean president Salvador Allende; painter unknown.

title: Japanese‑Style Geisha
info: Outsider Artist Sharon van Dams conceived the design; Painture Collective executed the mural in a Japanese aesthetic.

title: Delft‑Blue Teapot
info: Anne‑Mercedes Langhorst’s giant Delft‑blue teapot unites Chinese origins and Dutch identity, created for elderly home De Leeuwenhoek.

title: Vincent Vega 3D
info: Greek artist Insane 51 layers cyan/red images of John Travolta’s Pulp Fiction character for an anaglyph 3D effect—best viewed with red/green glasses.

title: Helixotherapy
info: Bali‑born Wild Drawing (WD) blends Eastern and Western comic influences in this large‑scale mural.

title: De Koolmees
info: Humorous bird mural by Rotterdam illustrator Danny “Ready2Rumbl” Rumbl, known for bright colours and playful pop‑culture references.

title: Peeta Anamorphic Forms
info: Venetian artist Peeta warps perception with 3D anamorphosis, revealing the deceit of visual perspective through shifting geometry.

title: Opposites in Balance
info: Outsider Artist Antoine Monod de Froideville integrates reinforcing opposites and Islamic‑inspired repeating patterns; executed by Painture Collective.
